about_the_game:
The template is a game template officially produced by GameCreator - Kotonoha. It can be used for visually creating chat software-style interactive novel games. This template includes the features of the GameCreator engine as well as the unique core systems and editors specific to the template.

Character Setup

In the database, you can configure character presets, setting the names, avatars, and brief descriptions for multiple characters.

Message Commands

Includes commonly used chat message commands:
"Send Message", "Send Pictures", "Send Animation", "Send Video", "Send Voice Message","Send System Message", "Clean Up Messages", "Change Background", "Change Title"

Editor Real-time Preview

No need to run the game, what you see is what you get. The corresponding effects will be displayed while editing.
